inclusion.criterion: Sacrocolpopexy with or without concomitant procedures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients having the first start surgery of the day to standardize hospital time.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Intra-operative cystotomy or urinary tract injury
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He has a severe bulbar urethral stricture that requires surgical fixation.
